title: SetPayButtonParams
description: Parameters for rendering or updating the InstantPay button

amount.description: Payment amount as decimal string, includes network fee

recipient.description: Bounceable TON address of the payment recipient

label.description: Button label indicating the payment action

invoiceId.description: Unique UUID identifying this payment invoice

jetton.description: Optional jetton master contract address for jetton payments

adnlAddress.description: Optional merchant ADNL address for enhanced security
